ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Swarm-B - EFI / LP - lp extended dataset
ResourceHeader.Description:
The extended swb_rm EFI LP data from the probes in the so-called “harmonic submode” which contributes with more than 99% to the normal LP science data. They include
* estimates of the electron density, using the ion current * estimates of the electron temperature and spacecraft potential from both probes * flags of informative character or indicating quality issues of data * estimates of the electron temperature using a combination of the results from both probes, applying a modified, potentially improved blending algorithm compared to the present L1b algorithm
The data are intended for users with some experience and understanding of Langmuir probe data.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
The access and use of Swarm products are regulated by the ESA's Data Policy (https://earth.esa.int/eogateway/documents/20142/1564626/ESA-Data-Policy-ESA-PB-EO-2010-54.pdf) and subject to the acceptance of the specific Terms and Conditions (https://earth.esa.int/eogateway/documents/20142/1564626/Terms-and-Conditions-for-the-use-of-ESA-Data.pdf).
Users accessing Swarm products are intrinsically acknowledging and accepting the above.

NumericalData.Caveats: * density e- - plasma density from ion current * temperature e- - electron temperature, blended value * s/c pot - spacecraft potential, blended value
